dc:description: Reddish micaceous clay with worn black glaze. Blunt flat nozzle with straight sides. Fairly deep bowl with sides converging toward top. Overhanging rim and large filling hole. Attached to high cylindrical stand with flaring base, part of which is broken off. No handle. 7.7cm wide plus standard.
